name: Have You Washed Your Hands
description:
Tom Francis wakes up one night and cannot find his daughter. He leaves his house to find his daughter in this dark and ghost town where the curfew applies. Every second spent outside negatively affects his own health and reduces the chance of finding his daughter. Suspecting that the street gangs kidnapped his daughter in this chaotic city, where even the police don't help, Tom finds himself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.


- To protect yourself from the disease, you should stay away from sick and unmasked people.
- You can weaken the effects of your disease by finding food and medicine.
- You can dialogue and manipulate people and gang members who come across on the way.
- You can fight with gang members, or you can proceed in stealth. Your call.
- You can infiltrate into their bases in disguise or by using your lockpicking skills.
- Your choices will affect the ending of the story.
